task.summary: Default task

feat: scorecard widget
Setup of scorecard widget list view

feat: scorecard widget
Implemented scorecard list on widget Implemented scorecard view on widget

feat(plugin): Implementation
Implemented support for new plugin type

fix(loaders): Implementation
- Changed all plugin loaders to small

fix: update scorecard view URL structure
Updated appUrl path in ScorecardView to include 'view' for correct routing.
fix: fixed issues with view scorecard from plugin not appending the default ou and pe selections

chore: update dependencies and refactor scorecard-related hooks
- Upgraded `@hisptz/dhis2-scorecard` to `^1.2.2` and `@hisptz/dhis2-analytics` to `2.1.10`. - Refactored hooks in ScorecardViewPage to align with updated library methods. - Improved typing and removed unnecessary dependencies in various components.

refactor: shared components
Moved the shared folder to the app and changed all references
refactor: monorepo cleanup Removed monorepo setup

fix: ide settings
Deleted IDE settings to refresh the setup
refactor: cleanup of dead code - Removed the access tab and moved organisation unit to general
fix: sharing - Improved scorecard sharing in the configuration

refactor: enhance scorecard dimensions and actions
- Refactored `useDimensions` and related hooks for improved parameter handling. - Integrated `ScorecardSharing` into `ScorecardActions`. - Updated `ScorecardResetButton` to fix resetting logic and improve button state handling.
refactor: cleanup - Deleted unnecessary `console.log` statements from `useDimensions`. - Updated translation keys to align with the latest changes.

refactor: improve formatting, hooks, and typing in ScorecardList components
- Standardized code formatting across multiple components for better readability. - Refactored `useScorecardListData` to enhance query handling and integrate better with URL parameters. - Streamlined imports by removing redundant `React` imports. - Improved typing and applied cleaner parameter handling in components like `ListScorecardDisplay` and `ScorecardListCard`.

refactor: streamline ScorecardList components and improve UI consistency
- Removed unused imports and redundant code from `ScorecardListCard` and related components. - Simplified access logic with default authorization values for readability. - Adjusted styles for better layout and uniform spacing across cards. - Optimized grid display in `GridScorecardDisplay` for responsiveness. - Tweaked font sizes and margins for improved visual hierarchy.

refactor: rename "widget" module to "plugin" and improve type safety
- Updated folder structure and imports to reflect the new module name. - Enhanced typing in validation functions and related utilities. - Standardized and cleaned up code formatting for consistency.

fix: enhance PluginScorecardList actions and improve sharing logic
- Added loading state handling to `Button` and `useManagePluginConfig` for better feedback during actions. - Improved sharing configuration logic to align `dashboardItem` sharing with the related scorecard. - Updated `MenuItem` to include `key` property to resolve React warnings. - Refined translation keys and updated corresponding `.pot` file.

refactor: cleanup utility functions and optimize imports
- Removed unused utility functions and redundant code for better clarity and maintainability. - Standardized import formatting across the `utils.ts` file. - Improved parameter handling and updated typings for consistency. - Enhanced code readability and alignment with style conventions. - Updated `yarn.lock` to clean dependencies.

refactor: enhance styles and fix type assertions in ScorecardList
- Added `--container-width` theme variable for improved layout control. - Adjusted `.container` styles in `App.css` for consistency. - Updated `Pagination` and related components with width adjustments for better responsiveness. - Replaced `console.log` with safer `user!` type assertions for cleaner logic in `authority.ts`.

refactor: streamline access control and improve sharing logic
- Unified access control logic by directly utilizing metadata sharing objects. - Simplified `ScorecardEditButton` and related hooks by removing redundant `useMemo` computations. - Refactored data queries to include metadata sharing for consistent access management. - Improved typing consistency and formatting across updated files. - Removed unused imports and components like `ScorecardSharing` for better maintainability.

refactor: update ScorecardListCard styles for better UI consistency
- Replaced legacy CSS class names with Tailwind's flex utilities for improved readability. - Enhanced hover styles for better user feedback. - Standardized spacing and alignment across card elements.

refactor: integrate Recoil for HelpMenu state management and clean up imports
- Replaced `useState` with `useRecoilState` for `helpEnabled` state in `ScorecardList`. - Updated `HelpMenu` to utilize Recoil's `useSetRecoilState`. - Cleaned up redundant `React` imports across updated files. - Adjusted line formatting for improved code readability.

refactor: add contextual help with EditHelpSteps and improve help text organization
- Introduced `EditHelpSteps` component in `ScorecardManagement` to manage contextual help. - Enhanced `help` metadata with additional fields and consolidated help text for clarity. - Updated `TabHeader` to enable help state via Recoil. - Added distinguishing CSS classes to elements for targeted help steps. - Cleaned up and modularized code across modified components for better maintainability.

refactor: improve error handling, refetch logic, and code formatting across Scorecard components
- Enhanced error logging in `SaveButton` with additional `console.error` output for debugging. - Improved refetch integration in `ScorecardList` components, enabling better state management after actions like deletion. - Updated help constants in `scorecardManagement` for better contextual support. - Refined optional typing in schema fields and cleaned up overall code formatting for readability.

refactor: simplify Pagination logic and adjust default page size in ScorecardList
- Removed redundant page size options from `Pagination` to streamline the component. - Updated default `pageSize` from 8 to 10 for consistency across hooks and pagination logic. - Added safeguard in `onPageChange` to prevent navigating beyond available pages.

refactor: remove unused inline styles from ScorecardViewPage
- Eliminated redundant `width` and `height` styles (`100dvw` and `100dvh`) from container div for cleaner code.

refactor: update version to 3.0.0-beta.00 and improve translation keys in `.pot` file
- Bumped application version to `3.0.0-beta.00` in `package.json`. - Added new translation keys and refined existing ones for better localization support.

chore: setup pnpm
Migrated to pnpm
feat: added support for migrating sharing settings when the app starts
chore: update pnpm lockfile with dependency version bumps and esbuild platform updates
chore: improvements
chore: removed git hooks
chore: setup ci for release and publishing to app hub
chore: fixes and improvements
chore: fix period type issues for migrated scorecards
chore: improve null checks and update import paths in scorecard migration hook
fix: dashboard plugin styling issues
fix: dashboard plugin styling issues
fix: dashboard plugin styling issues
fix: dashboard plugin response to dimension changes
chore: improve code formatting and update import paths in utils module
feat: add sharing functionality and highlighted items to scorecard

chore: updated version to the latest major
BREAKING CHANGE: This release will now have new implementation of sharing settings. All previous implementation will migrated on first app start.
chore: add IDE project settings for inspections, linters, and code styles
chore: rename App Hub publish command for consistency
chore: update pnpm version to 10.22.0 in package.json

fix: updated scorecard lib to fix some of the reported issues
Fixes #775
fix: fixed layout issues with the new app-platform implementation

MESSAGE.value:
refactor: improve error handling, refetch logic, and code formatting across Scorecard components
- Enhanced error logging in `SaveButton` with additional `console.error` output for debugging. - Improved refetch integration in `ScorecardList` components, enabling better state management after actions like deletion. - Updated help constants in `scorecardManagement` for better contextual support. - Refined optional typing in schema fields and cleaned up overall code formatting for readability.

refactor: simplify Pagination logic and adjust default page size in ScorecardList
- Removed redundant page size options from `Pagination` to streamline the component. - Updated default `pageSize` from 8 to 10 for consistency across hooks and pagination logic. - Added safeguard in `onPageChange` to prevent navigating beyond available pages.

refactor: remove unused inline styles from ScorecardViewPage
- Eliminated redundant `width` and `height` styles (`100dvw` and `100dvh`) from container div for cleaner code.

refactor: update version to 3.0.0-beta.00 and improve translation keys in `.pot` file
- Bumped application version to `3.0.0-beta.00` in `package.json`. - Added new translation keys and refined existing ones for better localization support.

chore: setup pnpm
Migrated to pnpm
feat: added support for migrating sharing settings when the app starts
chore: update pnpm lockfile with dependency version bumps and esbuild platform updates
chore: improvements
chore: removed git hooks
chore: setup ci for release and publishing to app hub
chore: fixes and improvements
chore: fix period type issues for migrated scorecards
chore: improve null checks and update import paths in scorecard migration hook
fix: dashboard plugin styling issues
fix: dashboard plugin response to dimension changes
chore: improve code formatting and update import paths in utils module
feat: add sharing functionality and highlighted items to scorecard

chore: updated version to the latest major
BREAKING CHANGE: This release will now have new implementation of sharing settings. All previous implementation will migrated on first app start.
chore: add project-specific IDE configuration files
chore: add IDE project settings for inspections, linters, and code styles
chore: rename App Hub publish command for consistency
chore: add issue templates for feature requests and bug reports
chore: update pnpm version to 10.22.0 in package.json

fix: updated scorecard lib to fix some of the reported issues
Fixes #775
fix: fixed layout issues with the new app-platform implementation
